New Records: The Celtics attempted 17 more shots than the Knicks, setting a team record
The Celtics were one 3-pointer away from breaking the NBA record for the most made 3-pointers in a game
Key Match Events: The Celtics took a massive 43-24 lead at the end of the first quarter
The Knicks' wing duo of Bridges and Anunoby struggled offensively
Pre-Game Insights: The Celtics were motivated by the new-look Knicks and executed well despite the circumstances
The Knicks were seen as a team looking to make a statement
Post-Match Reflections: The Celtics' depth and ability to get contributions from multiple players were highlighted
The Knicks' wing struggles were a key factor in the game's outcome
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics' offensive system influenced their fans, with almost breaking a 3-pointer record becoming a point of interest
Others: The Knicks have a canyon gap between their wings and the Celtics', which is a significant point about the game's dynamics
